description.0: A jade polearm made by the archons, capable of slaying ancient beasts.

0.0: On hit, increases ATK by <cryo>3.2%</cryo> for 6s. Max 7 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s. While in possession of the maximum possible stacks, DMG dealt is increased by <cryo>12%</cryo>.

1.0: On hit, increases ATK by <cryo>3.9%</cryo> for 6s. Max 7 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s. While in possession of the maximum possible stacks, DMG dealt is increased by <cryo>15%</cryo>.

2.0: On hit, increases ATK by <cryo>4.6%</cryo> for 6s. Max 7 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s. While in possession of the maximum possible stacks, DMG dealt is increased by <cryo>18%</cryo>.

3.0: On hit, increases ATK by <cryo>5.3%</cryo> for 6s. Max 7 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s. While in possession of the maximum possible stacks, DMG dealt is increased by <cryo>21%</cryo>.

4.0: On hit, increases ATK by <cryo>6%</cryo> for 6s. Max 7 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s. While in possession of the maximum possible stacks, DMG dealt is increased by <cryo>24%</cryo>.
